creator: gschuster@icecold.de
text:
Used Apache 1.3.27 with ActivePerl 5.6 for a long time, upgraded to Apache 
1.3.29 and ActivePerl 5.8.3
Now, ScriptInterpreterSource Registry isn't working any more, have to tell 
location of interpreter in all scripts to have them work.
OS is W2K SP4, all patches applied, running Apache 1.3.29 with Perl as CGI

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
(1) what does the error log say? (what means "doesn't work"?)

(2) did active perl 5.8.3 create the appropriate registry entries?

creator: gschuster@icecold.de
text:
The error.log says:
(2)No such file or directory: couldn't spawn child process: /path/to/perlinfo.pl
I think the appropriate registry entries exist, but I could have searched for 
the wrong entries.
